flavor: "You come to hurt Vermin?! You come to make us afraid?"
name: Vermin
text: [star] Forced Response: After Vermin activates against you, discard the top card of the encounter deck. If a RAT minion was discarded this way, put it into play engaged with you.

flavor: "I'll make you afraid!"
name: Vermin
text: [star] Forced Response: After Vermin activates against you, discard the top two cards of the encounter deck. Put the first RAT minion that was discarded this way, into play engaged with you.

flavor: "This is how you're going to die."
name: Vermin
text: [star] Forced Response: After Vermin activates against you, discard the top two cards of the encounter deck. Put each RAT minion that was discarded this way, into play engaged with you. Resolve the "Special" effect on Even More Rats.

name: Rats and More Rats
text: Contents: Vermin (I) and Vermin (II). Vermin (II) and Vermin (III) in expert mode instead.) Vermin and Standard Encounter sets. One modular encounter set (recommended: Feral Instincts). Setup: Put the Even More Rats Environment into play. Put a Regular Rats minion into play engaged with each player. Shuffle the encounter deck. Advance to stage 1B.

flavor: Vermin has come out of the sewers. Following him is a mischief of rats threatening to invade the city.
name: Rats and More Rats
text: [star] Forced Reponse: After step one of the villain phase, place 1 threat of each RAT minion. Resolve the "Special" effect on Even More Rats.

flavor: In addition to rats coming out of the sewers, rats have started pouring out every building in the city.
name: Rats, Rats and More Rats
text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for Bringer of Plague and reveal it. Advance to stage 2B.

flavor: If you don't stop Vermin now, who knows what the rats will do to the city.
name: Rats, Rats and More Rats
text: [star] Forced Reponse: After step one of the villain phase, place 1 threat of each RAT minion. Resolve the "Special" effect on Even More Rats. If this scheme is completed, rats have invaded the city and the players lose the game.

name: Even More Rats
text: Threat on RAT minions cannot be thwarted. Special: If the total number of threat on RAT minions and on the main scheme is equal to or more than the target threat value of the main scheme, the current stage of the main scheme is completed.

name: Regular Rats
text: Surge. X is equal to the number of RAT minions engaged with you (to a maximum of 3). [star] Boost: Put Regular Rats into play engaged with you.

name: Feral Rats
text: Surge. Quickstrike. X is equal to the number of RAT minions engaged with you (to a maximum of 3). [star] Boost: Put Feral Rats into play engaged with you.

flavor: "SKEEEEE!!"
name: Vermin Clone
text: Guard. While Vermin Clone is engaged with you, characters you control cannot attack Regular Rats and Feral Rats. [star] Boost: Give the attacking enemy an additional boost card for this activation.

flavor: "FEED... FOR VERMIN." - Vermin
name: Swarmed by Rats
text: Attach to your identity. Each Rat minion engaged with you gains guard. Interrupt: After you defeat a RAT minion engaged with you, discard 2 cards from your hand → discard this card.

flavor: Vermin was cloned back in the day. Today, his clones follow him along with all the other rats.
name: Vermin Cloning
text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a copy of Vermin Clone and put it into play engaged with the first player. [crisis]

flavor: The mischief of rats that follow Vermin are vicious and bring disease with them wherever he goes.
name: Bringer of Plague
text: When Revealed: Place threat here equal to the amount of threat on RAT minions in play. [hazard]

flavor: "chk... chk..." - Random rat
name: A Mischief of Rats
text: When Revealed: Discard X cards from the encounter deck, where X is equal to double the villain's stage number. For each RAT minion discarded this way, choose to either place 2 threat on the main scheme or put that minion into play engaged with you.

name: Rabid Assault
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Vermin schemes. If there are no RAT minions engaged with you, this card gains surge. When Revealed (Hero): Vermin attacks you. If there are no RAT minions engaged with you, this card gains surge.

name: A thousand Bites
text: When Revealed: For each RAT minion engaged with you, choose to either place 1 threat on that minion, or take 1 indirect damage. Resolve the "Special" effect on Even More Rats. If there is one or no Rat minions engaged with you, this card gains surge.

name: Feral Instincts
text: Attach to the villain. [star] Forced Interrupt: When the villain would scheme against you, it attacks you instead. This attack gains overkill. Do not give the villain a boost card for this activation. Then, discard Feral Instincts.

name: Primal Strength
text: Attach to the villain. X is equal to the villain's stage number. [star] Interrupt: When the villain attacks you, choose to either spend [physical] [physical] resources or exhaust your identity → discard Primal Strength.

flavor: "GRRAARRGGHH!!!"
name: Unleashed Beast
text: When Revealed: The villain attacks you. If you are in alter-ego form, do not give the villain a boost card for this activation. [star] Boost: This card gets +1 Boost icon ( [boost] ) if this activation is an attack.

name: Cornered Animal
text: When Revealed: You take 1 damage. If the villain has taken 6[per_hero] or more damage, choose to either spend a [energy] resource or take 2 indirect damage. If the villain has taken 12[per_hero] or more damage, choose to either discard a random card from your hand or place 2 threat on the main scheme.

flavor: "I don't have to hurt you. I want to."
name: Scorpion
text: [star] Forced Interrupt: When the villain phase ends, if Scorpion's Tail is not attached to Scorpion, put it into play and attach it to Scorpion.

flavor: "Now the Scorpion has to hurt you."
name: Scorpion
text: Scorpion cannot be stunned. [star] Forced Interrupt: When the villain phase ends, if Scorpion's Tail is not attached to Scorpion, put it into play and attach it to Scorpion.

name: Scorpion
text: Scorpion cannot be stunned. When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for Tail Laser and reveal it. [star] Forced Interrupt: When the villain phase ends, if Scorpion's Tail is not attached to Scorpion, put it into play and attach it to Scorpion.

errata: Scorpion's Tail is an attachment not un upgrade (Merlin).
name: Thirst for Revenge
text: Contents: Scorpion (I) and Scorpion (II). Scorpion (II) and Scorpion (III) in expert mode instead.). Scorpion and Standard Encounter sets. One modular encounter set (recommended: Feral Instincts). Setup: Put the J. Jonah Jameson suport into play. Put the Scorpion's Tail into play and attach it to Scorpion. Shuffle the encounter deck. Advance to stage 1B.

flavor: Scorpion wants revenge on J. Jonah Jameson for turning him into the beast that he is today.
name: Thirst for Revenge
text: When Completed: Place 1 wound counter on the J. Jonah Jameson support.

flavor: Scorpion has tracked down JJJ, and won't stop chasing him until he is eliminated.
name: Vengeful Poursuit
text: When Revealed: Advance to stage 2B.

flavor: Protect JJJ with all your might, no matter how much you dislike him!
name: Vengeful Poursuit
text: Forced Interrupt: When this scheme would be completed, place 1 wound counter on the J. Jonah Jameson support instead. Then, remove all threat from this scheme and any upgrades and attachments attached to it.

name: J. Jonah Jameson
text: Permanent. Interrupt: When a friendly character would take any amount of damage, place 1 wound counter here → prevent all of that damage. Forced Interrupt: When there are 3 + 1[per_hero] or more wound counters here, the players lose the game.

name: Scorpion's Tail
text: [star] Forced Response: After Scorpion attacks and damages a character, that character is stunned. If that character is already stunned, deal 1 damage to that character. Interrupt: When Scorpion would take any amount of damage, it may be placed here instead. Then, if there is 10[per_hero] or more damage here, set Scorpion's Tail aside, out of play. Then, Scorpion takes 8[per_hero] damage.

name: Tail Armor
text: Move 5 damage from Scorpion's Tail to Scorpion. Attach to Scorpion's Tail. If you cannot, this card gains surge. Forced Interrupt: When damage would be placed on Scorpion's Tail, place it here instead. If there is 8 or more damage here, discard Tail Armor.

name: Honed Stinger
text: Move 5 damage from Scorpion's Tail to Scorpion. Attach to Scorpion's Tail. If you cannot, this card gains surge. Forced Interrupt: When Scorpion attacks, he gets +1 ATK for that attack, and the attack gains piercing. [star] Boost: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck.

name: Tail Laser
text: Move 5 damage from Scorpion's Tail to Scorpion. Attach to Scorpion's Tail. If you cannot, this card gains surge. Forced Interrupt: When Scorpion attacks, the attack gains ranged and overkill. [star] Boost: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck.

flavor: "Strictly amateur hour!" - Scorpion
name: Coiled Up
text: Move 5 damage from Scorpion's Tail to Scorpion. If Scorpion's Tail is attached to Scorpion, attach Coiled Up to your identity. If you cannot, this card gains surge. Forced Interrupt: When Scorpion's Tail is set aside, discard Coiled up.

name: Human Fly
text: Forced Interrupt: When Human Fly would take any amount of damage from an attack, prevent all of that damage. (Limit once per round.) [star] Boost: After this activation ends, deal yourself this card as a facedown encounter card.

flavor: "What're you lookin' at!?"
name: Grizzly
text: [star] Forced Interrupt: When Grizzly attacks, the attack gains piercing. [star] Boost: This attack gains piercing.

flavor: "Outta the way!"
name: Hippo
text: Toughness. [star] Boost: This attack gains overkill.

name: Luring Out Prey
text: hinder 1[per_hero].

flavor: Scorpion is causing as much mayhem as possible.
name: A Mess of Thing
text: When Revealed: Place 2 additional threat here for each stunned friendly character. [hazard]

flavor: "You think you're so much smarter than me, don't cha?" - Scorpion
name: Tail Enhancements
text: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until a TAIL attachment is discarded. Reveal that card. [star] Boost: This card gets +1 boost icon ( [boost] ) for each TAIL attachment attached to Scorpion.

flavor: "AHAHAH!" - Scorpion
name: Stinger Stab
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Scorpion schemes. If you are stunned, Scorpion gets +2 SCH for this activation. When Revealed (Hero): Scorpion attacks you. After this activation, if you are stunned, you are confused.

flavor: "You scared?" - Scorpion
name: Restraining Pincers
text: When Revealed: Choose to either spend [physical] p or stun your identity. If you cannot, this card gains surge. [star] Boost: If this activation deals damage to you, exhaust your hero.

flavor: "SKREEEEEEEEE!"
name: The Lizard
text: [star] Forced Response: After The Lizard schemes, flip The Lizard. Forced Interrupt: When the villain phase ends, discard 1[per_hero] cards from the top of the encounter deck. Reveal each REPTILE attachment that was discarded this way.

name: Curtis Connor
text: Curtis Connors cannot take damage. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Curtis Connors would attack, place 1 shame counter on the Reptilian Rage environment instead. If there are 3 shame counters there, Curtis Connors schemes. [star] Forced Response: After Curtis Connors schemes, flip Curtis Connors.

name: The Lizard
text: [star] Forced Response: After The Lizard schemes, flip The Lizard. Forced Interrupt: When the villain phase ends, discard 1[per_hero] cards from the top of the encounter deck. Each player in player order must reveal each the topmost REPTILE attachment in the encounter discard pile.

name: Curtis Connor
text: Curtis Connors cannot take damage. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Curtis Connors would attack, place 1 shame counter on the Reptilian Rage environment instead. If there are 3 shame counters there, Curtis Connors schemes. [star] Forced Response: After Curtis Connors schemes, flip Curtis Connors.

name: The Lizard
text: [star] Forced Response: After The Lizard schemes, flip The Lizard. Forced Interrupt: When the villain phase ends, discard 2[per_hero] cards from the top of the encounter deck. Each player in player order must reveal each the topmost REPTILE attachment in the encounter discard pile.

name: Curtis Connor
text: Curtis Connors cannot take damage. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Curtis Connors would attack, place 2 shame counter on the Reptilian Rage environment instead. If there are 3 shame counters there, Curtis Connors schemes. [star] Forced Response: After Curtis Connors schemes, flip Curtis Connors.

flavor: You go to check on Curtis Connors because he has been acting strange lately.
name: Using the Mammal Brain
text: Contents: Curtis Connors (I) and Curtis Connors (II). (Curtis Connors (II) and Curtis Connors (III) instead for expert mode.) The Lizard and Standard encounters sets. One modular encounter set (recommanded: Lizard Thralls). Setup: Put the Reptilian Rage environment into play. The villain starts on the Curtis Connors side. Advance to stage 1B.

flavor: Doctor Curtis is in control of his brains, but the Lizard is slowly taking over.
name: Using the Mammal Brain
text: When completed: Put shame counters on the Reptilian Rage environment so that it has 3 shame counters on it. If The Lizard is not in play, flip Curtis Connors.

flavor: You discover that Connors's reptilian brain is influencing him to act out as The Lizard.
name: Reptile Brain Taking Over
text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a copy of Reptile Research and reveal it. Advance to stage 2B.

flavor: Doctor Curtis Connors is losing control. Stop him before the Lizard takes over his mind.
name: Reptile Brain Taking Over
text: X is the number of REPTILE cards (including The Lizard) in play.

flavor: You couldn't get through to Connors before The Lizard gained control.
name: No Humanity Left
text: When Revealed: If The Lizard is not in play, flip Curtis Connors. Put shame counters on the Reptilian Rage environment so that it has 3 shame counters. Advance to stage 3B.

flavor: The Lizard has full control of Connors's mind. Defeat him before Connors is completely gone.
name: No Humanity Left
text:
The Lizard cannot be flipped.
Threat cannot be removed from this scheme.
If this stage is completed, Curtis Connors is dead, and the players lose the game.

name: Reptilian Rage
text: The Lizard gets +1 ATK for each shame counter on Reptilian Rage. (Max 3 shame counters.) While there is 1 or more shame counters here, The Lizard's attacks gain overkill. Forced Response: After The Lizard attacks, remove shame counters from Reptilian Rage: Villain Stage I: Remove 2 shame counters. Villain Stage II: Remove 1 shame counter. Villain Stage III: Remove 0 shame counters.

name: Enhanced Lizard Senses
text: When Revealed: Curtis Connors schemes with +1[per_hero] SCH. Attach this to The Lizard. Interrupt: When an event is played, cancel the effects of that event and discard it. Then, place Enhanced Lizard Senses at the bottom of the encounter discard pile.

name: Komodo Claws
text: When Revealed: Curtis Connors schemes with +1[per_hero] SCH. Attach this to The Lizard. The Lizard gains retaliate 1. Hero Action: Spend a [energy] resource and take 1 damage → place Komodo Claws at the bottom of the encounter discard pile.

name: Lizard Tail
text: When Revealed: Curtis Connors schemes with +1[per_hero] SCH. Attach this to The Lizard. [star] Forced Interrupt: When The Lizard attacks, the attack gains ranged. Hero Action: Spend a [mental] resource and place 1 threat on the main scheme → place Lizard Tail at the bottom of the encounter discard pile.

name: Alligator Jaws
text: When Revealed: Curtis Connors schemes with +1[per_hero] SCH. Attach this to The Lizard. [star] Forced Interrupt: When The Lizard attacks, the attack gains piercing. Hero Action: Spend a [physical] resource and exhaust your hero → place Alligator Jaws at the bottom of the encounter discard pile.

name: Ancient Reptilan Brain
text: When Revealed: Curtis Connors schemes with +1[per_hero] SCH. Attach this to The Lizard. [star] Forced Interrupt: When The Lizard attacks and damages a character, deal damage to another friendly character equal to the attacked character's ATK. Hero Action: confuse your hero → place Ancient Reptilian Brain at the bottom of the encounter discard pile.

name: Boa Constricted
text: Attach to your identity. Attached identity cannot trigger the "Hero Action" effect on REPTILE attachments. Forced Interrupt: When the hero phase ends, discard Boa Constricted.

name: Iguana Whip
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): This card gains surge. When Revealed (Hero): The villain attacks you. Place 1 threat on the main scheme for each REPTILE attachment attached to the villain. [star] Boost: If this activation is an attack, place 1 threat on the main scheme.

name: Triggered Transformation
text: When Revealed: Place shame counters on the Reptilian Rage environment so that it has 3 shame counters. Choose to either exhaust your hero or the villain schemes. This activation ignores confused status cards. [star] Boost: Place 1 shame counter on the Reptilian Rage environment.

name: Shed Skin
text: When Revealed: Heal 3 damage from the villain and remove each status card from him. Give the villain a tough status card. [star] Boost: Give the villain a tough status card.

flavor: "This is why homo sapiens must be extermined! No manners!"
name: Iguana
text: [star] Iguana gets +1 SCH and +1 ATK for each REPTILE card in play (to a maximum of +4 SCH and +4 ATK).

flavor: "I am whoever I choose to be."
name: The Chameleon
text: [star] The Chameleon has SCH and ATK equal to the villain's SCH and ATK.

flavor: Doctor Connors is researching reptiles' regenerative abilities so he can learn how to grow back his own missing arm.
name: Reptile Research
text: When Revealed: Place 1 additional threat here for each REPTILE card in play. [hazard]

name: Wake Your Inner Lizard
text: Hinder 1[per_hero] (When Revealed: Place an additionnal 1 per Player threat here). Forced Interrupt: When the villain phase begins, search the encounter deck and the discard pile for a copy of Lizard Thrall and put it into play engaged with the first player.

name: Lizard Thrall
text: [star] Forced Interrupt: When Lizard Thrall would scheme, it attacks instead, without triggering its "Forced Interrupt" effect. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Lizard Thrall would attack, it schemes instead, without triggering its "Forced Interrupt" effect.

name: Lizard Thrall
text: [star] Forced Interrupt: When Lizard Thrall would scheme, it attacks instead, without triggering its "Forced Interrupt" effect. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Lizard Thrall would attack, it schemes instead, without triggering its "Forced Interrupt" effect.

name: Lizard Thrall
text: [star] Forced Interrupt: When Lizard Thrall would scheme, it attacks instead, without triggering its "Forced Interrupt" effect. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Lizard Thrall would attack, it schemes instead, without triggering its "Forced Interrupt" effect.

name: Lizard Thrall
text: [star] Forced Interrupt: When Lizard Thrall would scheme, it attacks instead, without triggering its "Forced Interrupt" effect. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Lizard Thrall would attack, it schemes instead, without triggering its "Forced Interrupt" effect.

name: Vulture
text: Quickstrike. Villainous.

name: The Calypso Serum
text: hinder 1[per_hero].

name: Toxic Gas
text: Hinder 1 per player (When Revealed: Place an additionnal 1 per Player threat here).
